survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on sustainable tourism practices from travelers to improve eco-friendly travel options and initiatives.

questions.question_text: How often do you consider sustainability practices when choosing a travel destination?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure frequency. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How often do you consider sustainability practices when choosing a travel destination?

questions.question_text: Which of the following sustainable tourism practices are most important to you? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to gauge priority areas.

script.question_text: Which of the following sustainable tourism practices are most important to you? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What challenges, if any, do you face when trying to engage in sustainable tourism?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative insights. Limit response length to 300 characters.

script.question_text: What challenges, if any, do you face when trying to engage in sustainable tourism?

questions.question_text: Would you be willing to pay a premium for accommodations that are certified sustainable?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no/depends question to measure willingness to pay.
